page.title: 07Farms
page.content: The area contains the ribbon development which is Corton village Much of the surrounding area is agricultural with four arable farms,one also keeps pigs,a small holding and two nurseries There are areas of deciduous woodland and coastal development of holiday camps The farms are small with some farmers sharing equipment One farm is leased from Waveney District Council The crops are wheat,oats,barley and sugarbeet with peas in leased fields grown for Birds Eye. The small holding grows predominantly vegetables.
